00020     TDirectory* EventProcessor::getHistoDirectory() {
00021         if (!histoDir_) {
00022             histoDir_=process_.makeHistoDirectory(name_);
00023         }
00024         histoDir_->cd(); // make this the current directory
00025         return histoDir_;
00026     }
